name: 陳育威
objective: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, etc.
schedule:
1.　　Introduction to Fintech
2.　　Mobile payment
3.　　Crowd funding
4.　　P2P remittance
5.　　Blockchain
materials: Reference book: Fintech revolution, Sofie Blakstad & Robert Allen (ebook)
